attributes.action: bring in legislation to permit doctors to end human life by injection in circumstances where this is considered medically to be in the patient's best interests and where the only current allowable method to do so is withdrawal of food and hydration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pet owners who withheld food and water from their sick animals so that they died of dehydration and starvation rather than having them humanely put down would be vigourously prosecuted but this scenario seems to be viewed as entirely acceptable for humans for whom the only let out is court ordered withsrawal of food and water. This is barbaric.
